text: Nelson is a city and the county seat of Nuckolls County, Nebraska, United States. The population was 456 at the 2020 census. The city was named for C. Nelson Wheeler, the original owner of the town site. A 1925 edition is available for download at University of Nebraskaâ€”Lincoln Digital Commons. ==References== Category:County seats in Nebraska Category:Cities in Nebraska
title: Nelson, Nebraska
